useCase: Generate transaction statement by exporting to CSV

Generate statement from All Transactions.description: The All Transactions view should let generate a statement
input: Select the location of the generated file
output: A file named 'all-transactions${TIMESTAMP}.csv' should be generated in the selected folder

Generate statement from Account Details.description: The Account Details view should let generate a statement
input: Select an account by double clicking on a row
Select the location of the generated file
output: A file named 'transactions${TIMESTAMP}.csv' should be generated in the selected folder

Generate empty statement.description: An account with no transactions should still generate a statement
input: Select the location of the generated file
output: A file named 'all-transactions${TIMESTAMP}.csv' should be generated in the selected folder and should only have headers
